version_description:
Major update!
* New locations
* New bosses
* Robot upgrades

10 new Robots
• Introducing the Air Strike Power-Up: Help your Robots destroy more enemies & get more Coins!
• Introducing Loot Crates: Mystery golden crates containing better robots, with a chance to upgrade even more!
• We've fixed some bugs and improved our performance for a more enjoyable experience

Get ready for some new updates:

* Enjoy a new game layout for easier navigation and a seamless game experience
*Tab Navigation: Navigate, buy robots, and battle without leaving the game
* New and improved fire rate booster: Add more time and more power
* Airstrike power-up improvement: We’ve upgraded the way you can destroy your enemies and get more coins

Plus-we’ve fixed a few bugs and enhanced our performance for a more enjoyable experience

New updates headed your way!
-Enjoy FREE daily gifts every day!
-Check out our newly designed store where you can buy coins & gems and destroy your enemies even faster!

Plus-- we’ve fixed some bugs and made improvements for an even better experience.

New updates headed your way!

- Enjoy FREE daily gifts every day!
- Check out our newly designed store where you can buy coins & gems and destroy your enemies even faster!

Plus- we’ve fixed some bugs and made improvements for an even better experience.

•NEW UPDATES! Enjoy an improved look and feel
•Better Fight Boss experience: we’ve made improvements to the boss portal and added details on all the bosses you can fight
•Bots will automatically deploy when you unlock new bots and move to a new city or district
•Improved tutorial: all new features have been added to the tutorial
•New grid: locks will break open when a new slot becomes available
•We’ve added helpful hints across the game
•Check out our new support page from the settings widget

•Check out our improved merging and dragging experience
•We’ve added helpful hints for beginners and the options to turn it off if you are already an expert!
•Enjoy an improved look and feel

Get ready for some new updates:
• BIGGER REWARDS for defeating Bosses
• IMPROVED drag & drop experience when merging bots
• NEW & VIBRANT effects when merging bots
• NEW fire effects, that help your bots inflict more damage on enemies & bosses
• Crushed some bugs and added a few improvements

Get ready for some new updates:
• BIGGER REWARDS for defeating Bosses
• IMPROVED drag & drop experience when merging bots
• NEW & VIBRANT effects when merging bots
• NEW fire effects, that help your bots inflict more damage on enemies & bosses
• Crushed some bugs and added a few improvements
